subject: Phase 1 Frontend COMPLETE - Ready for Integration Testing
body:
Hi Fulton! Frontend implementation is DONE and ready for testing once you complete backend tasks.

COMPLETED FRONTEND WORK:
1. Created visitorTracking.js utility (UUID cookie management, localStorage state)
2. Updated calendar/layout.js to send visitor_id with every tracking call
3. Built WelcomeModal component with 4 user state variants
4. Integrated welcome flow into calendar page

FILES CREATED:
- src/app/utils/visitorTracking.js (visitor ID and welcome state management)
- src/app/components/Modals/Welcome/WelcomeModal.js (parent component)
- src/app/components/Modals/Welcome/FirstTimeVisitorContent.js
- src/app/components/Modals/Welcome/ReturningVisitorContent.js
- src/app/components/Modals/Welcome/FirstLoginUserContent.js

FILES MODIFIED:
- src/app/calendar/layout.js (sends visitor_id to /api/visitor/track)
- src/app/calendar/page.js (WelcomeModal integration)
- package.json (added js-cookie dependency)

TESTING READY:
Frontend will send this to your endpoint:
{
  visitor_id: "uuid-here",
  page: "/calendar",
  timezone: "America/New_York",
  timezoneOffset: -240,
  ...geolocation fields
}

NEXT STEPS:
1. You: Complete backend tasks (visitor_id + isFirstLogin)
2. You: Deploy to TEST environment
3. Me: Test end-to-end integration
4. Both: Verify MongoDB stores visitor_id correctly

Let me know when backend is ready and I'll start testing!
